name: Privacy Principles Task Force
description: The purpose of the Privacy Model Task Force is to bring together a small group of people to draft a set of privacy principles for the web.

members.name: Technical Architecture Group
members.description:
The TAG is a special working group within the W3C, chartered (under the W3C Process Document) with stewardship of the Web architecture.

As outlined by the Process Document, there are three aspects to this mission:

  • to document and build consensus around principles of Web architecture and to interpret and clarify these principles when necessary;
  • to resolve issues involving general Web architecture brought to the TAG;
  • to help coordinate cross-technology architecture developments inside and outside W3C.
